tiled.io
Class MapHelper

java.lang.Object
  tiled.io.MapHelper

public class MapHelper
extends java.lang.Object

A handler for saving and loading maps.

Constructor Detail

MapHelper

public MapHelper()
Method Detail

init

public static void init(PluginClassLoader p)
Called to tell the MapHelper which PluginClassLoader to use when finding a suitable plugin for a filename.

Parameters:
p - the PluginClassLoader instance to use

saveMap

public static void saveMap(Map currentMap,
                           java.lang.String filename)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Saves the current map. Use the extension (.xxx) of the filename to determine the plugin to use when writing the file. Throws an exception when the extension is not supported by either the TMX writer or a plugin. (Unlikely)

Parameters:
filename - filename to save the current map to
currentMap - Map instance to save to the file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
MapWriter.writeMap(Map, String)

saveTileset

public static void saveTileset(TileSet set,
                               java.lang.String filename)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Saves a tileset. Use the extension (.xxx) of the filename to determine the plugin to use when writing the file. Throws an exception when the extension is not supported by either the TMX writer or a plugin.

Parameters:
filename - Filename to save the tileset to.
set - The TileSet instance to save to the file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
MapWriter.writeTileset(TileSet, String)

saveMap

public static void saveMap(Map currentMap,
                           PluggableMapIO pmio,
                           java.lang.String filename)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Saves a map. Ignores the extension of the filename, and instead uses the passed plugin to write the file. Plugins can still refuse to save the file based on the extension, but this is not recommended practice.

Parameters:
currentMap -
pmio -
filename -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

loadMap

public static Map loadMap(java.lang.String file)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Loads a map. Use the extension (.xxx) of the filename to determine the plugin to use when reading the file. Throws an exception when the extension is not supported by either the TMX writer or a plugin.

Parameters:
file - filename of map to load
Returns:
a new Map, loaded from the specified file by a plugin
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
MapReader.readMap(String)

loadTileset

public static TileSet loadTileset(java.lang.String file)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Loads a tileset. Use the extension (.xxx) of the filename to determine the plugin to use when reading the file. Throws an exception when the extension is not supported by either the TMX writer or a plugin.

Parameters:
file - filename of map to load
Returns:
A new TileSet, loaded from the specified file by a plugin
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
MapReader.readTileset(String)

reportPluginMessages

private static void reportPluginMessages(PluginLogger logger)
Reports messages from the plugin to the user in a dialog.

Parameters:
s - A Stack which was used by the plugin to record any messages it had for the user
